casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Justin Duane Hurd No. 154P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Attorney at Law, for Hurd, Justin Duane. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 28th of April 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."

Ervin, J. recused
